summary: This document contains a witness statement from Martha Thomson, an Intelligence Officer at Her Majesty's Passport Office. It details her role in providing passport records related to Anouska De Georgiou and outlines the procedures for passport issuance and record-keeping.

persons.name: Martha Thomson
persons.context: Martha Thomson is an Intelligence Officer at Her Majesty's Passport Office and provides a statement regarding passport records related to Anouska De Georgiou.

persons.name: Anouska De Georgiou
persons.context: Anouska De Georgiou is mentioned as the individual for whom passport records were requested, with details of her passport history provided.

connections.description: Martha Thomson, as an Intelligence Officer, is responsible for handling passport records related to Anouska De Georgiou.

locations: 3 Northgate, 96 Milton Street, Glasgow, G4 OBT, United Kingdom
keyFacts: Martha Thomson has been employed by Her Majesty's Passport Office for 14 years.
The statement includes details about the passport application process and record-keeping.
Anouska De Georgiou is noted to have held four passports between 1989 and 1999.
One of Anouska De Georgiou's passports was reported as stolen.
The document indicates that no records were found for travel outside the UK for Anouska De Georgiou.
